topics.body:
omg my puppies are hilarious XD

my mom played hide-and-seek with them and they had to try to find her somewhere upstairs
why she decided to do something like that is beyond me. she was just feeling cheeky right then

she hid in EHAN's bathroom and kept calling to them, but they had no clue where she was

but then one of them heard her voice and they both found her hiding in EHAN's bathroom and they all excited when they found her because they got worried about where she disappeared to

*tl;dr: _mom tricked the puppies and played a funny game of hide-and-seek with them_*

topics.body:
Well fucking stupidity; no offense mac users, but apparently a mac fan fucked up a acquaintance of mine's computer.

Basically what they did was they installed "Yosemite" on a computer that hardware wise is incompatible and fucked it up.

If you're going to install a operating system yourself the *FIRST* thing you do is check the specs to make sure it's compatible.
